website_summaries.verdict: A solid pair of snowshoes for kids that is perfect for young snow lovers who can't wait to spend time outdoors in wintry conditions.
pros: Made especially for kids weighing up to 90 lbs
Excellent traction in kid-friendly conditions and sturdy build
Easy for youngsters to learn to use
cons: Bindings tend to require tightening or adjusting during wear, especially after extended time walking in the snow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good size and shape for kids. Seems pretty adaptable to a wide range of weights, the bindings are the limiting factor on how large of shoes will fit them. The only downside for long term use is that the rails are made of plastic and after some use on rocks get dulled down pretty easily. The front gripper is steel and holds up better, but is not articulated as on most snowshoes and seems to clog up with snow and weigh the foot down. Fully functional and kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4 and 5 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my 4 and 5 year old. A bit too small for my 7 year old though. They seem durable - have made it through one trek so far! Looking forward to more outings!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old uses these off and on a trail. They were absolutely perfect for both. They stay secure and comfortable. They are overall very durable. MSR has always been a promising brand and we’ve loved everything that we’ve purchased from them.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Ann

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for our 4-year-old
customer_reviews.text: We live in the Lake Tahoe area and got these for our 4-year-old since she's getting too heavy to carry in a backpack. They are easy to put on, relatively lightweight, and narrow enough that she doesn't trip. She loves going on adventures in the snow. She's very strong and fit, but we definitely have to make our trips shorter...about 2-3 miles seems to be her max right now. But it's so fun that she can snowshoe on her own now, and she'll get years of use! We looooove MSR!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JC Lach

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just turned 3 and she is starting to fit into a shoe size 8. We have to really sinch them down but they work and will work for many years. Such high quality. My husband and I have the adult version and we love those too. This is our new winter Saturday tradition!
customer_reviews.author: DenBooks

customer_reviews.title: Great snow shoes for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of snow shoes for my 7 year old. There are no moving parts on the shoe. They just strap to his boots. They do not pivot like adult snowshoes which makes it easier for him to walk around like little kids do.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS H.

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these so my six year old son could join the family snowshoeing. He loves them and they have worked great for his first 2 outings. They keep him on top of the snow, stay secure on his feet and are fairly easy to maneuver in on the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Kitchin

customer_reviews.title: Good little kid snowshoe
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year loves these snowshoes, with no prior experience she was able to use them right away with no problems. They tighten down well on size 10 snow boots, and can probably fit a much smaller boot. They are easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.author: ESkier

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids, easy to get on and off!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my kids, we are very happy with quality and ease of use!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L. Hietala

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are quality Snowshoes. And as indicated they are for kids and not real big kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on/off
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my niece for Christmas, and they were a big hit. Easy to get on/off, and plenty of support for her 60lb weight.
customer_reviews.author: jetx

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and fit correctly
customer_reviews.text: Loved how they fit our 4 year old and it was solid equipment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MSR Tyker Kids' Snowshoes for Children (Pair)
product_meta.description: The MSR Tyker Kids' Snowshoe offers excellent traction and floatation in a compact, kid-friendly design. Engineered to carry boys and girls up to 90 pounds, they feature steel crampons and kid-friendly molded traction bars that provide all-conditions grip and maximum safety for little ones on snowy trails. The durable injection-molded deck can stand years of use in a varied snow conditions, from slick slopes to deep powder. Secure, adjustable kid-friendly bindings are designed for smaller, mitten-clad hands and can be used on a variety of children’s footwear. The MSR Tyker Kids' Snowshoe measures 6.5 x 17 inches, weighs 2.06 pounds/pair, and can carry an 90-pound load; bindings fit kids shoe sizes 7.5-13.5, and adult men’s shoe sizes 1-4.5. Sold as a pair. Made in the USA. Manufacturer’s three-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Kids' snowshoes with excellent traction and floatation, designed especially for children weighing up to 90 pounds
Steel crampons and kid-friendly molded traction bars provide all-conditions grip and maximum safety
Durable injection-molded deck withstands years of use in varied snow conditions
Secure, adjustable kid-friendly bindings are designed for smaller, mitten-clad hands and can be used on a variety of children’s footwear
Snowshoes measure 6.5 x 17 inches, weigh 2.06 pounds, and can carry an 90-pound load; bindings fit kids' shoe sizes 7.5-13.5, adult men’s 1-4.5; made in the USA
